definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: I have considered my ways and have turned my steps to your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 我思想我所行的道，就轉步歸向你的法度。

sentences.english: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
sentences.chinese: 我思想我所行的道，就轉步歸向你的法度。
